title: Eagle Eyes CELESTE Women's Sunglasses - Tortoise Round Polarized Sunglasses
features: CUTE AND SASSY: Whether you’re a blanket and book kind of girl or would rather do yoga in the park, Celeste tortoise shades will keep you protected and looking good wherever you may go.
FASHIONABLE: Round sunglasses that are functional and fashionable. Don’t be fooled by their cute design, you won’t need to compromise protection, with Celeste you get both.
ULTIMATE PROTECTION: Triple-filter polarization (UVA/UVB/blue light) for maximum eye protection and visual clarity ensures that you will be taking the best care possible of those beautiful eyes.

LEADING EDGE: Developed from NASA technology, by replicating oil droplets found in the eyes of eagles with UVA, UVB and Blue-light blocking that works on the inside and out to maintain a youthful look
INNOVATIVE DESIGN: Round green tortoise sunglasses with TriLenium 7 polarized gradient lenses. Lens: W 57mm H 43mm Bridge: 21mm Temple: 140mm. Includes a protective storage case.
description: Whether you’re a blanket and book kind of girl or would rather do yoga in the park, Celeste tortoise shades from Eagle Eyes will keep you protected and looking good during those long Saturday afternoons. Available in peach, green or lilac tortoise with gradient lenses that are smudge-proof, waterproof and scratch resistant. As always, Celeste by Eagle Eyes features the ultimate in eye protection courtesy of their exclusive triple filter polarization technology.ULTIMATE VISION ENHANCEMENTEagle Eyes sunglasses were developed from Original NASA Optic Technology and are worn by millions of people around the world who enjoy the protective vision-enhancing benefits without compromising style. Designed for people who are concerned with eye health and want an optimal visual experience.

Eyewear that is developed from original NASA optic technology, and designed by replicating oil droplets found in the eyes of eagles. Award-Winning TriLenium Lens Technology has Original UV and Blue Light Blocking Lenses that offer "dual action" benefits to block out 99.9% harmful UVA, UVB and vision destroying Blue-Light and allows in selective vision-enhancing light rays. Now you can see clearer and farther than ever before.

The only brand certified by the Space Foundation for UVA, UVB and blue-light protection. Truly a company committed to improving people's lives through their visual experiences, high-performance glasses for sun protection, night driving and for digital glare.

Round tortoise sunglasses that are cute and functional. They out-perform the competition due to the TriLenium7 patented technology. With innovative technology lenses are scratch resistant, smudge-proof and waterproof. Lens: W 57mm H 43mm Bridge: 21mm Temple: 140mm Each pair includes a protective storage case.
